> Hydras/DarkHawk:
>
> Hydras fell while Darkhawk continued attacking the spark extractor, 
> he was determined not let it go. Hydras slowly recovered of this 
> attack

The spark extractor looked like it wasn't doing well, but it still had a little fight left in it. It began buzzing as it did its best to evade Darkhawk's blasts. Its shielding was barely enough to protect it, but the blasts were still sending it reeling. 

Then with a sudden blast of energy it fired a power disintegration beam! However this beam was not fired at one of the Predicons, but instead at the ground, creating a four foot wide hole in the ground! Then with a swiftness born of desperation the extractor flew into the hole it made, and disappeared from view, even as it continued to fire creating a tunnel.

TAG: Hydras, Darkhawk)

> OOC: I sent you a mail Preston

I sent one back. Thanks :)

Preston
